++ Install Rsyslog

<<
[root@xikang-desktop ~]# rpm -e --nodeps sysklogd
[root@xikang-desktop ~]# rpm -Uvh rsyslog-4.4.2-4.7.i586.rpm
>>

+++ rsyslog.conf
<<
## for Acorn log
local3.*                                                 /dev/tty5
local3.*                                                 /var/log/Acorn_log
>>
